txt.en: You have failed to the deliver the message to the Captain-General
Angmar's Army has taken control of the Mine, no support can be sent
Another has informed the Captain-General, support arrive shortly at the mine.
Forces loyal to the Free Peoples have liberated the Isendeep.

'We have won the day for a moment. We must report this victory to the Captain-General and ask for support from Glân Vraig.\n\n'Make your way to Glân Vraig to the south and east and report our victory here at the Isendeep to Captain-General Tordúr. Tell him that we need reinforcements sent as quickly as possible. If we are not reinforced soon, the Enemy will return in too great a number to defeat.'

Glân Vraig lay to the south-east of the Isendeep.\n\nSergeant-at-Arms Herecyne is under orders to inform the Captain-General of the successful attack and acquisiton of the Isendeep. She has ordered you to make your way to the Free Peoples' encampment of Glân Vraig and tell the Captain-General of the success.
'This news is very well-received. I will order forces to make their way to the Isendeep immediately. Thank you for the news, [placeholder].'
Talk to Tordúr at Glân Vraig
Angmar's Army must not control the Mine
Support must not be present at the mine
